resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Mission: At Chandler Christian Community Center, we change lives by nourishing minds and bodies to create a connected, thriving community. Vision. To have a healthy and productive community built on a foundation of dignity and hope. CCCC\'s Food Bank distributed 16,961 food boxes. That was enough food to feed 58,458 individuals for at least 3 days (12,090 unique individuals). We received 932,924pounds of donated food from various partners.
